content.rendered:
Editor

David Balmer

David is a third year Spanish & History student at Grey College. He was instantly won over by The Monocle’s offer to make his hours of watching less-than-legally streamed football matches at least somewhat worthwhile.



Politics Editor

Conor Johnson
Conor is a third year Anthropology and Archaeology student at Van Mildert. After spending two years sitting in bed watching Netflix, Conor decided his most important academic year was the most suitable time to cofound a student Newspaper. Used to studying dead things, Conor believes he has what it takes to bring a breath of fresh air to Durham student journalism.



News Editor

Charlotte Evans

Charlotte is a third year History student at Van Mildert College. She’s been gossiping about people for years so thought she may as well have something to show for it.




Sports Editor

Ben Sampson

Ben is a third year student of Politics and Philosophy. He is also captain of the DU1 Football. Since he loves to talk about himself he figured why not write about himself too.



Editor at Large

Tom Saunders
Twitter | Medium| LinkedIn
Tom is a third year History student at Van Mildert College. He wants to get into Journalism and decided that instead of doing the hard graft of working his way up an existing newspaper he would just make his own one instead. Also created Chexit.co.uk
